TestGroupDocumentation.Title: pattern3 GetSet Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the content of trees got by unmarshalling of the pattern-3.xsd based XML documents and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a short restricted SimpleType with pattern value "\-\d{1}". Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short pattern-3.xsd, unmarshalled content tree GetSet test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls pattern-3-1.xml,...,pattern-3-5.xml documents which specify the values -4, -1, -9, -9, -3 for the short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-pattern-3 element and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified in xml value, then invokes elemObj.setValue(short), elemObj.getValue() should return set value.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short pattern-3.xsd GetSet test for dynamically created content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-pattern-3 type with the values -4, -1, -9, -9, -3 and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified values, then invokes elemObj.setValue(short) with various values, elemObj.getValue() should return set values.
